text: Explore building systems of LLMs that talk to each other through the AI agent system.

For the agent system project: Build a scientific paper viewing system in the MIST tui? Need to think about images... But i think viewing papers in here with their text content maybe but expecially making a nice interface for searching and viewing lists of papers.
for the agent project, I think MIST should stand for modular integrated support technologies, not modular integrated services and technologies. I think the first captures it a bit better.

for the agent project, I want to explore more with making the LLMs chat with each other more and see if I can make that do anything interesting. Also explore recursive language models(?) to help with context. I think the lighterweight model I talk with should definitely be engineered on the prompt side and how I feed data into it. Want to work on the personality side more.
project idea: dreaming note taker, notation app on phone that syncs with MIST which handles collating and logging dreams, and making connections between them.
for mist agent system, make standalone app to replace tui?
animate black holes as computer background?

llm agent project: Work on building more robust agent-type workflow for the LLM. Talking to itself, planning, etc to make better output. Let it try to come up with a good way to express and synthesize my notes.
